name: Sagia
description:
Sagia rule…tap the screen at the right moment to change the direction of the balls movement and hit a star with the ball.

Collecting different items affect the scoring and the difficulty of the game.

Features:

•           One touch gameplay

•           Easy to play & simple rule

•           Endless, relaxed gameplay, perfect time killer

•           No wifi, no problem, you can play offline anywhere, anytime

•           Suitable for all ages

•           Score competition with friend and players all over the world

•           No Ads (occasional breaks) if the player reach score of more than 2000 points

Enjoy the game and become the best world player of Sagia!
